title: Democracy Now! 2022-10-26 Wednesday
description:
Pennsylvania Senate candidates Mehmet Oz and Lieutenant Governor John Fetterman face off in their first and only debate; Penn State students protest a speaking event with Proud Boys founder Gavin McInnes; Black voters are organizing unprecedented turnout ahead of midterms.
